text: Arau tomaloke yadi sihamtaka sparsa karaara agate talakba diya, athaca sihamtara babe mohara dharya karaicha, tente yi nirdharana karaicha tara adha (adaya diya). Kintu yadi straisakale ksama karai diye athaba yara hatata bibahara bandhana si yadi mapha karai diye, arau ksama karai diyatorae'i takbaraara sannidhya; arau tomaloke nijara majata anugrahara katha paharai nayaba. Tomaloke yi karaa niscaya allaha seya sabisesa pratyaksakarai
